body:
@satsujin sorry for late reply, but waiting on translations for them, translator said they'd start this week, so you can expect it sometime in January. 

As for some better news, I originally only commissioned the 1st 9 chapters, but soon I'll be able to afford the remaining 7, so all 16 chapters will be  translated (eventually lol).

It only gets worse from here.  If you aren't a fan of NTR or cheating, you might as well stop here because this shit goes off the rails real quick.  Pretty soon she'll be getting passed around like yesterdays leftovers.
Page 9, he giving everyone the finger.
